mapper.insert: insert into caebusinessmode (busiModeId, PageNum, ballotTypeID, ballotName) values (#{busimodeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pagenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ballottypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ballotname,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
